TEXT.TITLE: TRANSNET <TRNT> TO SERVICE LEADING EDGE PRODUCTS
TEXT.BODY: TransNet Corp said its TransNet Service Center in Mountainside, N.J., has been named an authorized service organization for <Leading Edge> computer products. Reuter
